definition: (of a child) well-behaved/obediently/(term of endearment for a child) darling/sweetie

(of a child) well-behaved/obediently/(term of endearment for a child) darling/sweetie
to curry favor by showing obeisance (idiom)
(coll.) to speak in a clever and lovable way
to take sth as a lesson for next time (idiom)/once bitten, twice shy

sentences.english: Alright, well, be good, I love you.

sentences.chinese: “誰敢欺負我的乖兒子？”爸爸牽着兒子就往外走。

sentences.english: The boys were as good as gold on our walk.
sentences.chinese: 我們散步的時候，這幫小男孩表現得很乖。

sentences.english: Of course, ni Ping is right " big ox " good risible expression special love.
sentences.chinese: 當然，倪萍對“大牛”又乖又愛笑的表現非常喜愛。

sentences.english: My husband told me that my son was very good this afternoon and they had a happy time together.
sentences.chinese: 先生告訴我兒子下午非常乖，他倆一起過得很開心。

sentences.english: We learn quickly to stay away from the nasty stuff.
sentences.chinese: 很快我們就學乖了，離這爛東西遠遠的。

sentences.english: She was a wonderful sister, a wonderful daughter, wonderful aunt.
sentences.chinese: 她是非常稱職的姐姐，是乖女兒和好姨媽。

sentences.english: Well, he sure likes to run around a lot. Is he well behaved?
sentences.chinese: 呃，它總是喜歡不停地跑圈。它乖嗎？

sentences.english: Does your dog seem anxious and misbehave when left alone?
sentences.chinese: 你家的狗在獨處時是否表現出焦慮和不乖的行爲？

sentences.english: She's a family girl at heart and a student of gymnastics and dance.
sentences.chinese: 她內心裏是乖女孩在一家女子體操中心學舞蹈。

sentences.english: Is also good as gold the boys grown very refreshing.
sentences.chinese: 是個長得很清爽又很乖的男生。

sentences.english: He's just like a lamb with his wife and always comes to her hat in hand.
sentences.chinese: 他對老婆乖的了，看到她總是必恭必敬的。

sentences.english: Hoping the teacher would take them on an outing, the children were nice as pie .
sentences.chinese: 希望老師帶他們去遠足，孩子們表現得很乖。

definition: to do what one is told/obedient
erhua variant of 寶貝|宝贝[bao3 bei4]
to act like a spoiled child/to throw a tantrum/to act coquettishly
(of a child) well-behaved/obediently/(term of endearment for a child) darling/sweetie
